summary: Shift Management and Handover System - All features verified working correctly. Backend API tests (9/9 passed) and frontend E2E tests completed successfully.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Shift Management feature fully tested. All 9 backend API tests pass. Frontend E2E flow verified: receptionist can start shift, admin sees pending handovers, admin can confirm handover via dialog, receptionist can start new shift after handover is confirmed.

frontend_e2e_tests.navigate_to_daily_report: PASS - Daily Report page loads correctly
frontend_e2e_tests.start_shift_button_visible: PASS - Start Shift button visible when no active shift
frontend_e2e_tests.start_shift_functionality: PASS - Clicking Start Shift creates active shift
frontend_e2e_tests.shift_active_status_display: PASS - Shows 'Shift Active' with start time and duration
frontend_e2e_tests.pending_handovers_section: PASS - Admin sees 'Pending Handovers (1)' with recep1's shift
frontend_e2e_tests.confirm_handover_button: PASS - 'Confirm Handover' button visible for each pending shift
frontend_e2e_tests.confirm_handover_dialog: PASS - Dialog shows shift details (Staff, Branch, Start Time, Duration)
frontend_e2e_tests.confirm_handover_received_button: PASS - 'Confirm Handover Received' button in dialog
frontend_e2e_tests.handover_confirmation: PASS - Clicking confirm removes shift from pending list
frontend_e2e_tests.toast_notifications: PASS - Success toasts shown for shift start and handover confirmation
frontend_e2e_tests.receptionist_new_shift_after_handover: PASS - Receptionist can start new shift after handover confirmed

features_verified: Receptionist can start shift via 'Start Shift' button on Daily Report page
Active shift shows 'Shift Active' status with start time and duration
Admin sees 'Pending Handovers' section with count of active shifts
Admin can click 'Confirm Handover' to open confirmation dialog
Confirmation dialog shows shift details (Staff, Branch, Start Time, Duration)
Admin can confirm handover via 'Confirm Handover Received' button
After confirmation, shift is removed from Pending Handovers section
Receptionist can start a new shift after previous shift handover is confirmed
Toast notifications provide feedback for shift start and handover confirmation
